enhanced_by.reason: The reset method relies on the mark method to set the mark position, which is used to reset the stream to a previously marked position.
The reset method resets the read position to the mark position, which is influenced by the read operations.

The reset method affects the read position, which is used in the emitProgress method to calculate progress. Assertions about progress updates can be enhanced by considering the state changes after reset.
The reset method affects the remaining bytes to be read, which is related to the max size. Assertions about the max size can be enhanced by considering the state changes after reset.
